Title: Snatched
Plot: Freshly dumped by her musician boyfriend and fired from her job, all on the same day, suddenly, the rudderless thirtysomething, Emily Middleton, finds herself with two non-refundable tickets to Ecuador. Finding hard to swallow that she is about to lose the trip of a lifetime, Emily turns to the only person left to come with her: her idiosyncratic, phobic, and cat-loving mother, Linda. But, there, the dream holiday soon turns into an Equatorial nightmare when the mother-and-daughter duo ends up conned and abducted in broad daylight. Now, to stay alive, scaredy-cat Linda and impulsive Emily will need to set aside their differences, and like a fish out of water, navigate through dense jungle thickets. But, can they make it happen?
Stars: Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn, Kim Caramele, Raven Goodwin
Companies: Chernin Entertainment, Feigco Entertainment, Twentieth Century Fox
Tagline: Mess with me, mess with my mother.

Similars.Title: I Feel Pretty
Similars.Plot: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?
Similars.Stars: Amy Schumer, Michelle Williams, Emily Ratajkowski

Similars.Title: Trainwreck
Similars.Plot: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.
Similars.Stars: Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson

Similars.Title: Sisters
Similars.Plot: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.
Similars.Stars: Amy Poehler, Tina Fey, Maya Rudolph

Similars.Title: The Banger Sisters
Similars.Plot: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.
Similars.Stars: Susan Sarandon, Goldie Hawn, Geoffrey Rush

Similars.Title: B&B
Similars.Plot: Gay Londoners Marc and Fred plan for a weekend of mischief, baiting the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a deadly turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more sinister in mind.
Similars.Stars: Tom Bateman, Paul McGann, Callum Woodhouse

Similars.Title: The Boss
Similars.Plot: A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.
Similars.Stars: Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell, Peter Dinklage

Similars.Title: Bridget Everett: Gynecological Wonder
Similars.Plot: Bridget Everett takes Comedy Central by the balls in the world premiere of her one-hour special, Bridget Everett: Gynecological Wonder. Her raucous, raunchy and hilarious show is as ... See full summary »
Similars.Stars: Bridget Everett, Carmine Covelli, Alan Cumming

Similars.Title: Rough Night
Similars.Plot: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a bachelorette party in Miami.
Similars.Stars: Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon, Zoë Kravitz

Similars.Title: Life of the Party
Similars.Plot: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.
Similars.Stars: Melissa McCarthy, Matt Walsh, Molly Gordon

Similars.Title: Piller
Similars.Plot: After playing a set with his band at the El Rey, guitarist Tommy Raven was gifted a free night at a dingy motel. A visit from music blogger Becky Pearlie teaches him that nothing in life comes for free.
Similars.Stars: Tomer David, Liesel Hlista, Eli Revivo

Similars.Title: Hi-Lo Joe
Similars.Plot: Everyone loves Joe Ridley, except Joe. Dark, crushing depression envelops him and a childhood trauma haunts him. Elly loves him but he is pushing her away. Can he save himself before he loses everything?
Similars.Stars: Gethin Anthony, Jannik Archer, Tom Bateman

Similars.Title: The House
Similars.Plot: After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.
Similars.Stars: Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Ryan Simpkins
